channel.title: CVE Feed for Very Good Plugins -- WP Fusion Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Very Good Plugins -- WP Fusion Lite

item.title: CVE-2021-34660|2024-09-16T18:14:27.642Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- wp%20fusion%20lite
item.description: The WP Fusion Lite WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the startdate parameter found in the ~/includes/admin/logging/class-log-table-list.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 3.37.18.

item.title: CVE-2024-27972|2024-08-02T00:41:55.963Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- wp%20fusion%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in Very Good Plugins WP Fusion Lite allows Command Injection.This issue affects WP Fusion Lite: from n/a through 3.41.24.

item.title: CVE-2024-32796|2024-06-04T17:50:06.763Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- wp%20fusion%20lite
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Very Good Plugins WP Fusion Lite.This issue affects WP Fusion Lite: from n/a through 3.42.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-27972|2024-04-03T11:51:43.101Z -- very%20good%20plugins -- wp%20fusion%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in Very Good Plugins WP Fusion Lite allows Command Injection.This issue affects WP Fusion Lite: from n/a through 3.41.24.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in Very Good Plugins WP Fusion Lite allows Command Injection.This issue affects WP Fusion Lite: from n/a through 3.41.24.
